Summary: i was sitting out in my yard then i looked up cause i seen a bright light
divs: Sighting Detailsi was outside sitting on my porch and i seen a flash on my tree so i looked up and seen a big diamond shaped thing flying through the sky and i was in awe..i hurried up and called my friends over to see it and after maybe 30 seconds it disappered and shot up in the sky and my friend was like WOW and fell backwards on a swing and fell off my porch i think it scared him the worest
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Sheridan
There were no other sightings in Sheridan on or around September 11th 2009
